blogPost.excerpt: We built Cartloop Rewards to help Shopify merchants grow their business and drive more sales with the best-in-class tools like Gorgias, Typeform, Clercao, and more. Get access for free and run your Shopify store like a pro! 🚀
blogPost.body: We built Cartloop Rewards to help Shopify merchants grow their business and drive more sales with the best-in-class tools like Gorgias, Typeform, Clercao, and more. Get access for free and run your Shopify store like a pro! 🚀
blogPost.title: Cartloop Rewards - Exclusive deals for Shopify brands worth over $10,000
blogPost.author: Michael Sieb

localize.description: 私たちはCartloop Rewardsを構築し、Gorgias、Typeform、Clercaoなどのクラス最高のツールを使ってShopifyマーチャントがビジネスを成長させ、より多くの売上を達成できるようにしました。無料でアクセスして、あなたのShopifyストアをプロのように運営してみませんか？🚀
localize.tagline: 10,000ドル以上の価値があるShopifyブランドのための独占的な取引

localize.description: 我们建立了Cartloop Rewards，以帮助Shopify商家发展业务，并通过Gorgias、Typeform、Clercao等一流工具推动更多销售。免费获得访问权，像专家一样经营你的Shopify商店吧 🚀
localize.tagline: 价值超过10,000美元的Shopify品牌的独家交易

localize.description: 我們建立了Cartloop Rewards，以幫助Shopify商家發展業務，並通過Gorgias、Typeform、Clercao等一流工具推動更多銷售。免費獲得訪問權，像專家一樣經營你的Shopify商店吧 🚀
localize.tagline: 價值超過10,000美元的Shopify品牌的獨家交易

previous.excerpt: Access thousands of hand-crafted icons right inside your Google Docs! The Icons8 add-on works with Google Docs, Sheets, and Slides. - Enhance your presentations - Spice up your sheets - Engage readers in your documents
previous.title: Icons8 Google Docs Add-on - Add icons to your Google docs for free

localize.description: 在你的Google Docs中访问数以千计的手工制作的图标! Icons8插件可与Google Docs、Sheet和Slides一起使用。- 增强您的演示文稿 - 为您的工作表添彩 - 让读者参与您的文档

localize.description: 在你的Google Docs中訪問數以千計的手工製作的圖標! Icons8插件可與Google Docs、Sheet和Slides一起使用。- 增強您的演示文稿 - 爲您的工作表添彩 - 讓讀者參與您的文檔
